title: Establishes the New York International Scholarship program and makes an appropriation therefor
summary: Establishes the New York International Scholarship program; creates a program to supplement individuals receiving grants under the Benjamin A. Gilman International scholarship provided for under the International Academic Opportunity Act of 2000 (PL 106-309) therefore allowing recipients to defray their international travel costs and extending the time spent studying abroad in a non-English speaking country for up to a full academic year; appropriates $1,000,000 therefor.

   20  ING INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL COSTS AND EXTENDING  THE  TIME  SPENT  STUDYING
   21  ABROAD UP TO A FULL ACADEMIC YEAR; PROVIDED, HOWEVER THAT THE AMOUNT NOT
